name: channels-dvr
description: Channels DVR Server allows users to record live TV streams and watch them on any device. It integrates with HDHomeRun tuners and offers mobile apps, web playback, and automatic commercial skipping for home DVR setups.

features.title: Live Tv Recording
features.description: Record over-the-air TV with HDHomeRun tuners. Personal DVR

features.title: Multi-Device Sync
features.description: Watch on phones, tablets, and computers. Anywhere access

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage recordings through browser. Easy control

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Native apps for iOS and Android. Optimized experience

features.title: Episode Management
features.description: Organize and manage recorded shows. Library organization
